data.title: Treegens
data.description: We are GROWING a movement of regenerators through the most rewarding & transparen tree planting.

The Treegens and For Trees Club have now planted over 2 million mangrove trees, let's GROW! 

Treegens are BUIDLing the most rewarding and transparent tree planting through tokenized mangroves, a gamified Proof of Plant protocol & the world's first dynamic Semi-Soulbound Tokens. 

Now that Jimi has set a World Record for most trees planted in a day by 1 person, the Treegen movement is gearing up to break the next world record - most trees planted in a day by any number of people! That's 560M tre...
data.title: Treegens(ðŸŒ±,ðŸŒ³)
TreegensðŸŒ³
data.description:
Having already broken one Tree Planting [GUINNESS WORLD RECORD](https://www.guinnessworldrecords.com/world-records/744458-most-mangrove-trees-planted-by-an-individual-in-24-hours), Treegens DAO is on track to break another world record by getting 1B trees planted on World Environment Day! ðŸŒ³

![GWR](https://i.postimg.cc/v8W0tkjd/Jimi-World-record-Photo.jpg)

Our vision is a world where anyone can plant trees & earn a living. The Proof of Tree Protocol that Treegens has developed is the first step towards achieving this vision. Planters film before & after planting in our dApp, AI counts the trees, DAO members with staked $TGN verify the methodology was followed to mint tree token rewards, starting with mangroves.

# ðŸŒ³GROWalition Updates Since GG22ðŸŒ³
1) The Ethiopian Government which set the world record by planting 615.7M trees in 24 hours [joins our GROWalition](https://x.com/JimiCohen/status/1858859656413598199) 
2) [South African Minister of Environment](https://x.com/JimiCohen/status/1858559017208951228) pledges at least 1M trees.
3) [Nigerian Minister of Environment](https://x.com/JimiCohen/status/1858478674204344696) is in full support of our mission to get 1B trees planted on World Environment Day.
4) [Palau](https://x.com/JimiCohen/status/1892757454393332028) is participating & potentially all 12 Pacific Island countries.
5) Many other countries such as Ghana, [Fiji](https://x.com/JimiCohen/status/1892475805487583650), Kenya & Tanzania have expressed interest in the GROWalition.

# ðŸŒ³Key Developments & Tech Partnerships Since GG22ðŸŒ³
1) Audited all 3 of our smart contracts from the reputable [Protofire](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1cPnN4K4Meyh3rXpwhAoYZ_zA_ikdatQa/view?usp=sharing).
2) Updated Treegens [codebase](https://github.com/Treegens) to ensure security. 
3) Partnered with [Axis.Finance](https://axis.finance) to develop a multi-tier referral program for our presale using subgraphs & scalability through a custom Telegram App. 
4) Partnered with [Xade](https://www.xade.xyz/) to turn all of our Dynamic NFTs into AI Agents that grow the movement & with TMO to give all agent NFTs .tgn wallet addresses. 
5) Partnered with [BLOCK Games](https://www.blockprotocol.gg/) Games to gamify growing the movement, those that promote the DAO will earn $TGN depending on real engagement. 

Our intention of making every aspect of what we're developing open source is to support more builders to launch Proof of X Impact dApps, leveraging the user-friendly UI/UX developed with General Magic. 

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/wMRQs0bw/Treegens-Banner-01.png)

# ðŸŒ³ MANGROVE ADVISORS ðŸŒ³
![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/JncNV7zm/9.png)

Treegen planters are also incentivised to do health checks. 1/6th of an $MGRO token is minted per tree for the initial plant, another 1/6th after the health check after 3 months, 6 months, 12 months, 24 & 36 months. Any non surviving trees are reflected in the subsequent issuance such that 1 $MGRO token represents 1 mangrove tree that has grown to the point of 3 years.

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/QxRztRCK/download-4.gif)

Similar to Proof of Stake, $TGN token holders stake their governance token to verify the videos, assisted by AI tree counting. There are always multiple verifiers. If maliciously or carelessly approved or rejected, the DAO member will have a portion of their TGN slashed for accountability. 

# ðŸŒ³ FINANCIAL MODEL ðŸŒ³
Our tokenomics is designed such that 95% of $MGRO tokens goes to the tree planters on the ground & 5% goes to the DAO verifiers as rewards. We additionally aim to stream retro rewards to the $MGRO holders from our centralised carbon projects, carbon Forwards & grant funds. 

![download](https://i.postimg.cc/gJmr3zcw/Untitled-design-8.gif)

### Non-Fungible Updates (NFU)
![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/W3xQzSsn/download-14.gif)

Every verified video becomes viewable on the Treegens DAO map as a Non-Fungible Update video. In order for companies or individuals to make an ecological claim that they funded trees, they buy these NFT videos with $MGRO tokens, which burns / retires $MGRO.

# ðŸŒ³ EXPONENTIAL REGENERATION ðŸŒ³

Treegens DAO was designed to **scale** tree planting around the world. We will achieve exponential regeneration through carbon forwards. As an organisation we will be planting mangroves and sell the future value of the carbon credits as forwards. These forward funds are at a discounted rate yet still an order of magnitude more than what it costs to plant. By reinvesting these funds back into more mangroves & repeating this process, we will multiply our mangroves by approximately 9X. We will also stream a portion of these revenues towards retroactively rewarding $MGRO holders & stakers, making people bullish on tree planting!
![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/wxZKgsw5/download-16.gif)
# ðŸŒ³INNOVATIVE GAMIFICATIONðŸŒ³

Weâ€™re making regeneration both financially and emotionally rewarding through gamification. Trees funded and planted are showcased on leaderboards & on Dynamic NFT Agents.

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/4NypnJSB/Mockups-1-3.png)

We're also introducing the worldâ€™s first Dynamic Semi-Soulbound Token (DSST) to gamify tree planting and funding. The mind orb brightens as you fund trees (retiring $MGRO for non-fungible updates), and the heart orb brightens as you plant trees ( $MGRO is minted into your wallet). While the artwork is transferable, the orbs displaying impact metrics are not, appearing on whichever Treegen NFT you connect to our DApp. This innovation allows you to earn, not just buy, a visual Regen score, while still enabling customization and trading.

We are also making these the most dynamic NFTs ever created by introducing a 3rd dynamic element - the background also changes the more $TGN staked. Each NFT will come alive as an AI agent, able to post online to grow the movement. 

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/7LTV8THr/Treegens-Impact-Investment-Deck-3.png)


# ðŸŒ³ USER-CENTRIC DESIGN ðŸŒ³

Treegens DAO has partnered with the legends at General Magic for our frontend development & UI/UX design. GM has helped us leverage email or Google Login / Wallet Creation to easily onboard tree planters in developing countries around the world. GM has supported Giveth, clr.fund, TEC, ENS, The Commons Stack & many more impactful DAOs to create smooth user experiences & develop their front end. 

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/cLXjw77f/Partnership-section.png)

# ðŸŒ³EDUCATION in dAppðŸŒ³

The Proof of Tree dApp includes How-To Guides for both Mangrove Tree Planting & Verification. These education modules include videos & step by step guides in both English & Swahili. [Check out the UX on mobile.](https://treegens-frontend.vercel.app/dashboard/how-to-plant)

# ðŸŒ³ECOSYSTEM GROWTHðŸŒ³
Through account abstraction, social wallet creation & world class UI/UX, we're able to onboard users who have never heard of web3. Treegens is growing a movement of tree planters through the 1B tree campaign. There were 34M participants in Ethiopia's last world record of 615.7M trees last June. We expect there to be many more this June 5th & many will come onchain for the first time. 


# ðŸŒ³STREAMED RETRO REGEN REWARDSðŸŒ³
To GROW the movement & make everyone bullish on Regeneration, we plan to retroactively reward MGRO holders by streaming rewards to them via. SuperFluid. From Grant funds, Optimism RetroPGF, Optimism's Growth Experiment Grants, Carbon Forwards & yield from $Earth in our treasury will all flow towards $MGRO holders. 

# ðŸŒ³ USE OF FUNDS ðŸŒ³

Additional funding will enable us further improve the user experience to buy $MGRO & retire $MGRO tree tokens by purchasing NFT videos with our AI tree counting overlaid. We are also integrating staking as a 3rd visual element to level up our Dynamic NFT Agents. 

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/R0qk9K9X/Regenaissance-4.png)

# ðŸŒ³ OUR TEAM ðŸŒ³
![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/XvfQBJzP/Latest-Treegens-Impact-Investment-Deck-2.png)

# ðŸŒ³ TOP WEB3 ADVISORS ðŸŒ³
![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/5t2N2BNt/Re-Fi-Advisors.png)
data.problem:
**Misaligned Incentives**

Today our economy values the degeneration of nature more than it values the regeneration of nature. According to the UNEP, approximately 1.9 billion trees are planted yearly, yet approx. 15 billion are cut down each year. We Are losing forests at a rate equivalent to 27 soccer fields per minute! 

**Impact Transparency**

The impact sector faces criticism for not providing enough transparency. Peer reviewed studies have shown that donations increase by 52% within 1 year when nonprofits earn a seal of transparency. The amount of funds on the sidelines, not funding what matters could make all the difference for the climate crisis.
data.solution:
![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/J43g2Z1p/Proof-of-Plant.png)

The only way to create the $MGRO token is through Proof of Tree. Tree planters onboard through account abstraction / social logins, learn how to plant & film the mangrove trees, film the land before & after planting within our DApp with GPS automatically captured, then submit the data for DAO verification.  

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/7YC0gRK9/Treegens-Impact-Investment-Deck-2.png)

Treegen DAO members verify that the methodology of our 6 mangrove experts was followed in order to issue $MGRO. They also confirm that the trees were filmed correctly for our tree counting AI (one continual direction).
data.missionSummary: Our mission is to pioneer the most transparent & rewarding tree planting technology to GROW a movement of tree planters.
data.businessModel: Treegens DAO is developing carbon projects with mangrove trees & will be selling both TGN & MGRO from trees planted by the DAO.

data.description:
Treegens DAO is creating a world where anyone can plant trees and get rewarded. Let's GROW!

Since GG20, weâ€™ve planted 60,000 mangrove trees, we have built an API for our AI tree counting tool & Jimi the founder has officially broken the Guinness World Record for most trees planted in 24 hours by planting 30,469 mangroves! 

![GWR](https://i.postimg.cc/v8W0tkjd/Jimi-World-record-Photo.jpg)

We are soon launching our OS Technology to empower the Regen movement to break the next World Record - Most Trees Planted In a Day by Any Number of People, which is 560M trees! Our ambitious goal is 1B mangroves on Earth Day 2025. 

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/wMRQs0bw/Treegens-Banner-01.png)

### ðŸŒ³ THE CHALLENGE ðŸŒ³

**Misaligned Incentives**

Our economy currently values the degeneration of nature more than it values the regeneration of nature. According to the UNEP, approximately 1.9 billion trees are planted yearly, yet approx. 15 billion are cut down each year. We Are losing forests at a rate equivalent to 27 soccer fields per minute! 

**Impact Transparency**

The impact sector faces criticism for not providing enough transparency. Peer reviewed studies have shown that donations increase by 52% within 1 year when nonprofits become transparent. The amount of funds on the sidelines, not funding what matters could make all the difference for the climate crisis. 

### ðŸŒ³ HOW WE'RE SOLVING IT ðŸŒ³

### Proof of Plant

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/J43g2Z1p/Proof-of-Plant.png)

The only way to create the $MGRO token is through Proof of Plant. Tree planters onboard through account abstraction, learn how to plant & film the mangrove trees, film the land before & after planting in our DApp with GPS captured, then submit the data inside our DApp on their mobiles. 

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/4NypnJSB/Mockups-1-3.png)

Treegen DAO members then verify AI tree counted videos with GPS coordinates captured while filming in DApp. 1/6th of an $MGRO token is minted after this initial plant & another 1/6th is issued every 6 months over the course of 3 years. 95% of $MGRO tokens & retro rewards goes to the tree planters & 5% goes to the validators. 

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/QxRztRCK/download-4.gif)

Similar to Proof of Stake, $TGN token holders stake their governance token to verify the videos, assisted by AI tree counting. There are always multiple verifiers. If maliciously or carelessly approved or rejected, the DAO member will have their TGN slashed for accountability. 

![download](https://i.postimg.cc/gJmr3zcw/Untitled-design-8.gif)

### Non-Fungible Updates (NFU)
![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/W3xQzSsn/download-14.gif)


Every verified video becomes viewable on the Treegens DAO map as a Non-Fungible Update video, powered by LivePeer. In order for companies or individuals to make an ecological claim that they funded trees, they buy these NFT videos with $MGRO tokens, which burns / retires $MGRO.

### ðŸŒ³ EXPONENTIAL REGENERATION ðŸŒ³

Treegens DAO was designed to **scale** tree planting around the world. We will achieve exponential regeneration through carbon forwards. As an organisation we will be planting mangroves and sell the future value of the carbon credits as forwards. These forward funds are at a discounted rate yet still an order of magnitude more than it what it costs to plant. By reinvesying these funs back into more mangroves & repeating this process, we will multiply our mangroves by approximately 9X. We will also stream a portion of these revenues towards retroacively rewarding MGRO holders & stakers, making people bullish on tree planting!

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/wxZKgsw5/download-16.gif)

### GAMIFICATION

In addition to leaderboards, we are further gamifying the planting & funding of trees through the world's first Dynamic Semi-Soulbound Token (DSST). The mind orb gets brighter when you fund trees by retiring $MGRO & claim an NFU. The heart orbs get brighter when you plant mangrove trees & MGRO is minted to your wallet. While the underlying artwork is transferable, these overlaid orbs are non-transferable and will display on whichever Treegen NFT is connected to our DApp through your profile. This is because we are gamifying regeneration!

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/bJkMt096/DSST.png)

### ðŸŒ³ USER-CENTRIC ACCESSIBILITY ðŸŒ³

Treegens has partnered with the legends at General Magic for our frontend development & UI/UX design. GM has helped us leverage account abstraction to easily onboard tree planters in developing countries around the world. GM has supported Giveth, clr.fund, TEC, ENS, The Commons Stack & many more impactful DAOs to create smooth user experiences & develop their front end. 

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/cLXjw77f/Partnership-section.png)

We have also partnered with Protofire to audit all of our open source smart contracts. Protofire has worked with Filecoin, Polkadot, Aave & Avalanche. 
 
![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/FRwr9xsD/Screenshot-2024-04-17-at-01-41-07.png)

### ðŸŒ³STREAMED RETRO REGEN REWARDSðŸŒ³
To GROW the movement & make everyone bullish on Regeneration, we plan to retroactively reward MGRO holders by streaming rewards to them via. SuperFluid. From Grant funds, Optimism RetroPGF, Optimism's Growth Experiment Grants, EBF Forwards & yield from $Earth in our treasury will all flow towards $MGRO holders. 

![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/dtrRgfHY/Latest-Treegens-Impact-Investment-Deck-1.png)

### ðŸŒ³ OUR TEAM ðŸŒ³
![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/y8kygzvX/7.png)
### ðŸŒ³ MANGROVE ADVISORS ðŸŒ³
![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/JncNV7zm/9.png)

### ðŸŒ³ LEGENDARY WEB3 ADVISORS ðŸŒ³
![Results](https://i.postimg.cc/5t2N2BNt/Re-Fi-Advisors.png)

data.text:
**WE DID IT!**
Planted 30,469 mangrove trees: https://www.guinnessworldrecords.com/world-records/744458-most-mangrove-trees-planted-by-an-individual-in-24-hours#:~:text=The%20most%20mangrove%20trees%20planted,he%20was%204%20years%20old.

**Media:**
https://www.instagram.com/reel/C6GXnAltKsc/?igsh=MXU0NTk5a2ZyOWhpYg%3D%3D
https://youtu.be/jGsCosdwAq0?si=2P_InDgvekePgabn
https://www.dw.com/sw/ulimwengu-waadhimisha-siku-ya-kimataifa-ya-sayari-ya-dunia/a-68892032
https://youtu.be/8bs4nqLOdeI?si=KmmNrG7SbWrHin7w
https://twitter.com/tv47news/status/1782713131602682113?t=x_Igmhx2Laix4t20ncA30A&s=19
Unfortunately by the time the GWR became official, about a month had passed, which made the tier 1 media orgs I spoke with no longer deem it timely for an article. They did, however, express a keen interest in the next goal of 560M trees on Earth Day. I will, therefore, be promoting PNouns throughout these next initiatives. 

**Shoutouts:**
https://x.com/jimicohen/status/1783017695643877601?s=46
https://x.com/jimicohen/status/1783458862974050364?s=46
In addition to the main recap videos, we're also posting the full video of all trees planted, dedicating them to followers, engaging the community in this in this initiative: 
e.g. https://x.com/JimiCohen/status/1823238038266302726

questions.query: Have you participated in a previous Gitcoin Grants Round? If so, please name the rounds or link the builder profile associated with previous rounds.
questions.explanation: Yes, builder profile 0xfC9265A28f66CF4561D74A4E25D7Bbd3F482B8e6

questions.query: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.
questions.explanation:
1) Our project provides the OSS ecosystem with a user-centric design by GM for any builder to launch a Proof of X Impact dApp. 
2) Dynamic Semi-Soulbound tokens are not only NFTs that are dynamic based on multiple token-based data sets. DSSTs also enable both soulbound & fair gamification with all the benefits of secondary sales as the base level art is still transferrable with soulbound overlaid. 
3) By making all trained tree planting AI models open source alongside this ecosystem of impact verification & rewards, we are also expanding the possibilities for various tree verifications beyond mangroves & other forms of impact verifications, coupled with decentralised rewards. 
4) Treegens is also expanding the ecosystem by gaining mainstream media attention as we continue to break world records for planting.

questions.query: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?
questions.explanation:
1) Proof of Plant with staked governance tokens at stake when verifiers issue ecological credits on chain with AI tree counting built in. 
2) Gamification of both tree planting & tree funding through leaderboards & a dynamic semi-soulound tokens. 
3) Offramping ecological credits into mobile money Mpesa via FonBnk integration

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation: As written in the body of our grant, we plan to further build out the buyer's experience through chain abstraction with Arcana Network.   This will enable us to make onramping into the Treegens ecosystem as smooth as offramping into Mpesa will be.

questions.query: For any project deploying smart contracts on blockchain networks, please list all your deployer addresses and their corresponding blockchain networks. Use this format for each entry: [deployer_address], [chain_id]â€”for example, 0x123abc..., 42161 (This represents a deployer address on the Arbitrum network). Please include a separate line for each unique deployer address and blockchain combination.

questions.query: Vision Statement and Impact: Describe the long-term vision of your project and its intended impact on the Optimism and broader Superchain ecosystem, including both qualitative and quantitative benefits
questions.explanation: Our vision is a world where anyone can plant trees & get rewarded. We are onbaording tree planters in remote regions of developing countries on the Superchain via. Celo. Through email / social signup, wallet creation will be  smooth & simple.

questions.query: Initial Strategy: Outline a high-level strategy for how you will achieve your intended impact and key goals for the next 3-6 months
questions.explanation: In the next 3-6 months we will launch our Proof of Plant dApp which rewards tree planters in a decentralised way around the world. One strategy is to work with the best - from General Magic & Protofire to our expert advisors listed above. We will also be collaborating with Terexitarious for the ReFi Hackathon at COP. Terexitarious has hosted several successful hackathons & we will also bring in expert token engineering teachers.

questions.query: Team Expertise: Provide a brief summary on the teamâ€™s background and relevant expertise in token engineering and/or OP
questions.explanation: Ibrahim Aziz is a blockchain developer with a wide range of token engineering experience. The legendary Griff Green is on our advisory Team, who works with both TEC & OP.  General Magic is also doing our front end & they have worked with TEC.

questions.query: Existing Work: Provide evidence of any existing work, such as prototypes, research papers, or previous projects. If you have already done work within OP/ Superchain, please include that here too

questions.query: How does your project support the mission or goals of DeSci?
questions.explanation: 1/6th of the $MGRO tokens are allocated for the initial plant & an additional 1/6th is distributed every 6 months when the Treegens do health checks, over the course of 3 years. This is because we want to heavily incentivise health checks! These AI assisted health checks enable us to conduct many experiments with methodologies. There are varying recommendations of variables like spacing between each propagule, distance from the mother tree, planting where there is natural regeneration etc. which affect survival rates. By conducting these controlled experiments in many climates & species of mangroves, we can measure the optimal methodologies for planting each mangrove species.

questions.query: Describe how funds from the grants program will be used for your project.
questions.explanation:
Grant funds will be used for planting more mangroves & tracking survival rates of previously planted mangroves. 

If we raise enough, we will also improve out Proof of Plant dApp to iterate for user experience, integrating new features such as off-ramping into Mpesa directly for fiat use in Kenya.

questions.query: How does your project contribute to the growth of the OSS ecosystem? Please provide specific examples of how your application enhances or expands the current ecosystem.
questions.explanation:
Treegens DAO enhances the OSS ecosystem by open sourcing our an incredibly user friendly Proof of Tree protocol, built by General Magic. Our codebase including 3 smart contracts also enables people to create Proof of X dApps which requires staked tokens to become a verifier. 

Treegens DAO is expanding the current ecosystem by onboarding the masses. Ethiopia had 34M participants when they set the world record at 615.7M trees in 1 day. When we attempt to get 1B trees planted in 1 day with Ethiopia plus many other countries, there will be far more participants. Each participant will have an opportunity for impact onboarding. Let's GROW!!!

questions.query: What features or use cases does your dApp/App present? How is it differentiated?
questions.explanation:
Dynamic Semi-Soulbound token can trade the underlying design but not the impact metrics overlaid as previously explained. The use case is to gamify impact metrics while still enabling trading of the underlying asset. 

Our AI tree counting API & Proof of Tree dApp enables DAO members to verify the methodology makes decentralised tree planting rewards possible with both accountability via. slashing & rewards built in.

questions.query: What are your plans for further development, and how will the grant funds be used to achieve these goals?
questions.explanation:
We are currently finalising a multi-tier referral program for our presale, building off the OSS code of Axis.Finance. They already have 1 tier of referrals built in, we're building the second tier to also incentivise KOL managers to onboard & for our referral participants to onboard others as well. We are also integrating this into a Telegram app such that our community can easily receive & share their referral link to friends within Telegram. 

We will also train our AI to count various types of trees leading up to June 5th.

questions.query: Celo leverage - how does your project contributed to the Celo ecosystem?
questions.explanation: Treegens is onbaording tree planters around the world through social / email signups to auto-generate wallets in the background. This smooth process enables us to expand Celo's users whose first experience with crypto is a reward for planting mangrove trees. Our tech is also open source so that other real world builders can expand the Proof of Plant tech to include many types of trees & other forms of impact. We already have a 1 Guinness World Record for tree planting & will achieve more, while driving awareness towards Celo.
